alert.note: Alert for Mayaguez and Vicinity (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:42PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of the western interior, western, and northwestern Puerto Rico through 245 PM AST... At 1241 PM AST, a line of strong thunderstorms were located in area extending from Lares and Maricao northwestward to Aguadilla, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. Funnel clouds are possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aguadilla, Aguada, Rincon, Moca, Las Marias, Isabela, Anasco, Quebradillas, Lares, San Sebastian, La Playa, Aceitunas, Hato Arriba, Caban, Luyando, Juncal, Stella, Piedra Gorda, Cacao and Espino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
